citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:25am on
21-Feb-17.
Inspector arrived at the facility at 11:25am. Inspector called licensee but could not leave a voicemail because
voicemail was not set up on licensee's phone. At 11:26am, inspector sent licensee an email and a text message to
inquire about the availability for inspection. The licensee called the inspector stating they were not available for
inspection. Inspector left the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:25am  on
21-Feb-17.
Inspector arrived at the facility at 11:25am.  Inspector called licensee but could not leave a voicemail because
voicemail was not set up on licensee's phone.  At 11:26am, inspector sent licensee an email and a text message to
inquire about the availability for inspection.  The licensee called the inspector stating they were not available for
inspection.  Inspector left the facility.
